org.opendaylight.controller.northbound.commons.query

Interface Query<T>


  • public interface Query<T>
    Represents a parsed query used in filtering of collections.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int filter(java.util.Collection<T> collection)
      Apply the query on the given collection.
      int filter(T root, java.lang.Class<?> childType)
      Search the given root for a child collection and them apply the query on.
      java.util.List<T> find(java.util.Collection<T> collection)
      Find items in the given collection and return them as a new list.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        java.util.List<T> find(java.util.Collection<T> collection)
                       throws QueryException
        Find items in the given collection and return them as a new list. The original collection is not changed.
        Parameters:
        collection - to search in.
        Returns:
        list of items which match the query.
        Throws:
        QueryException

      • filter

        int filter(java.util.Collection<T> collection)
           throws QueryException
        Apply the query on the given collection. Note that this method will modify the given object by removing any items which don't match the query criteria. If the collection is 'singleton' or unmodifiable, invocation will result in an exception.
        Parameters:
        collection -
        Returns:
        the number matched items
        Throws:
        QueryException

      • filter

        int filter(T root,
         java.lang.Class<?> childType)
           throws QueryException
        Search the given root for a child collection and them apply the query on. Note that this method will modify the given object by removing any items which don't match the query criteria.
        Parameters:
        root - - top level object to search in
        childType - - the child type which represents the collection.
        Returns:
        the number of matched items
        Throws:
        QueryException
